trans:
The Jew said to the Christian man: "Do you want to deny your Christ and join our religion
Judaism
The Jew brought him a wooden cross.
.
The man replied, "Yes, I want to."
They gave him a spear and a sponge soaked in vinegar and said to him: "If you truly want to leave
your Christianity, spit on the cross, and then stab it with the spear."
The man, with his impure hand
He stabbed the cross with the spear, saying, "I stab you, O Christ."
As soon as the man stabbed the honored cross with the spear,
blood and water flowed from the wooden cross onto the ground.
The gathered crowd was greatly astonished,
and many of those present believed.
The man who threw the spear fell dead,
stiff as a stone.
The people took the blood and water and put it on their faces and heads,
including the Jewish man,
Felixius
